fixes.name: month end filter
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    DATEVALUE('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Last day of the month]) = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate]
    || 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[title date]
    || 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[RpDate] = 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Comparison date],
    TRUE(),
    FALSE()
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau boolean OR expression to DAX. DATE([Last day of the month]) was translated to DATEVALUE(...) to compare the DateTime-calculated field to 'RpDate'. Logical ORs were mapped to || and the boolean result is returned via IF(TRUE/FALSE). All column references were converted to 'Table'[Column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: One or more dependent calculated fields referenced Tableau [Parameters] (via title date / Comparison date), and per rules any expression that uses parameters must be implemented as a measure.
